content: Can you provide a Swift code that can accurately determine the percentage of customer types for Uber based on their sales data? Could you make the code more complex by taking into consideration other factors that may affect the customer type percentage such as the seasonality of sales, geographical location, or age group of customers? After obtaining the customer type percentage, could you provide a detailed explanation of how you arrived at your result? Also, can you suggest strategies for Uber to improve its customer type distribution based on the obtained results? Please include a thorough analysis of how Uber's business model leans more towards B2B or B2C based on the obtained data.
